page.title: 08JOBS IN SW.BOGNOR REGIS
page.content: {SW.Bognor Regis}is mainly a {residential}and{tourist}area. Therefore, the jobs that are available are concerned with{tourism}or the everyday needs of the people living in the area.People who work in our area are likely to be{employed}in {hotels, guest houses, restaurants, {shops and amusement arcades.}There are also jobs for people in the {nursing homes.}There are a few small {businesses}in the area that are run by local people and there is a small amount of{local government}work.People in this area seemed satisfied with their jobs. One of these was the local{community {police}woman:she has to know who is responsible for the{pubs,shops, {churches}and{entertainment.}She likes her job because it is different from year to year.
